title: Chaos and Panic Grip Tehran as Airstrikes Shake City
summary_full: Iranians were beginning their workweek as U.S. and Israeli strikes sent people fleeing parts of the capital and parents racing to collect children from schools.
summary_public: Iranians were beginning their workweek as U.S. and Israeli strikes sent people fleeing parts of the capital and parents racing to collect children from schools.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israeli strikes sent people fleeing parts of the capital
